channel.title: Help with NPCs
channel.description:
Hey, I am working on my server (based off TestScape), and have run across two different problems with NPCs:
1) I need some NPCs to face a certain direction when they are initially made spawned. (from autospawn.cfg)
2) I have gotten Jad to work very well, with the correct animations and even randomly doing mage, range, and mellee attacks... However while fighting him, he has 124/124 hp (should be 180 based on npc.cfg) and then once that is depleted, it goes back up to something like 260/124. Server-side debugging shows that his HP is correctly kept the whole time their, but it just will not display on the client.
Oh, and one more thing that I just can not figure out. I have a portal leading to a pk area, however when one person is already their, and then another comes, the player who was already their cannot see the other player without leaving and coming back.
